verbose_text: In mice, CLA has been repeatedly shown to increase the expression of sterol regulatory element binding protein-1c (SREBP-1c), key transcriptional regulator in hepatic lipogenesis and its downstream genes acetyl CoA carboxylase (ACC), fatty acid synthase (FASN), and stearoyl CoA desaturase-1 (SCD1) [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR] (XREF_TABLE).
evidence: expression of sterol regulatory element-binding protein-1c
